name: Battle.tech by Virtuals
description: Battle.Tech: The Future of AI-Driven Gaming Battle.Tech introduces the next era of platform intelligence with specialized AI agents managing tournaments, development, and operations. Powered by AWS Bedrock AI and the Virtuals G.A.M.E Framework, we've built a self-sustaining, autonomous gaming ecosystem. With real-time AI evolution, seamless collaboration, and a token-driven economy, Battle.Tech is reshaping gaming through transparency, innovation, and dynamic gameplay experiences. Join the revolution today!
